H0.text: The Strawberry Museum in the town of Wepion is in which country. France

H1.text: The Strawberry Museum in the town of Wepion is in which country. Netherlands

H2.text: The Strawberry Museum in the town of Wepion is in which country. Switzerland

H3.text: The Strawberry Museum in the town of Wepion is in which country. Beljum

A4.text: Wepion is a commune in the Ardennes department in France, so the Strawberry Museum there is located in France.

A5.text: Wepion is not in the Netherlands; it is a French commune, so the Netherlands hypothesis is incorrect.

A6.text: Wepion is not in Switzerland; it is a French commune, so the Switzerland hypothesis is incorrect.

A7.text: Wepion is not in Belgium; it is a French commune, so the Beljum hypothesis is incorrect.
